name: Gorilla Daddy 🌿
description: Indica-dominant hybrid (60/40) with 22-29% THC, delivering euphoric bliss and deep body relaxation. Earthy, spicy berry flavors with dense forest-green nugs. Ideal for pain, stress, and insomnia relief. Named for its potent, long-lasting effects reminiscent of a gorilla’s strength.

name: Jerry Gas Can 🌿
description: Sativa-leaning (70/30) with 18-19% THC, offering a hazy, creative high and skunky diesel aroma. Energizing yet relaxing, great for fatigue and mood elevation. The name nods to its fuel-like pungency and cerebral effects.

name: Jamaican Wedding Cake 🌿
description: Balanced hybrid (50/50) with 22-29% THC, blending sugary vanilla cake flavors with citrusy euphoria. Promotes relaxation and social connection. A tropical twist on the classic Wedding Cake strain.

name: Do Si Dos 🌿
description: Potent indica (70/30) with pungent earthy notes and high THC (25-30%). Induces heavy body relaxation, ideal for evening use. Named for its cookie-dough aroma and lineage from Girl Scout Cookies.

name: Cali Orange 🌿
description: Sativa-dominant with zesty citrus flavors and medium THC (15-18%). Uplifting yet balanced, perfect for daytime focus. A tribute to California’s sun-grown citrus heritage.

name: 10g Flower Pack 🌿
description: Mixed indoor/outdoor flower (10g) for bulk buyers. Strains may include Cali Orange (sativa) or Do Si Dos (indica). Economical for daily users.

name: 6g Cigars 🌿
description: Hand-rolled with top-shelf flower and wrapped in tobacco or hemp leaf for slow combustion. Rich, flavorful smoke with indica-dominant effects for relaxation. A luxurious, slow-burning experience.

name: Indoor 1¼ Size 🚬
description: Compact pre-rolls with indoor-grown flower (1.25g each), offering a balanced high (20-25% THC). Quick, convenient, and ideal for creative or social settings.

name: Indoor King Size 🚬
description: Larger pre-rolls (1g+) with premium indoor flower, delivering a long-lasting, uplifting high. Smooth burn with flavors accentuated by slow combustion.

name: Green Door 1¼ 🚬
description: Budget-friendly pre-rolls with sativa-dominant greenhouse flower (1.25g). Citrusy and energizing, perfect for daytime use. Named for the "green door" of accessible quality.

name: Green Door King 🚬
description: Extended-size version of Green Door’s sativa blend (1g+), offering prolonged euphoria and focus. A cost-effective option for extended sessions.

name: Moonsticks 🚬
description: Infused with distillate + kief for very high THC (30%+). Intense, long-lasting effects with a smooth burn. Named for its celestial, mind-expanding potency.

name: 5 Pack 🚬
description: Curated bundle of pre-rolls (mixed strains), offering variety and convenience. Ideal for sampling or gifting. Strains may include hybrids like Jamaican Wedding Cake.

name: 10 Pack 🚬
description: Bulk pre-roll set (10 units) for value-focused buyers. Consistent quality with options like indica-heavy Do Si Dos or balanced hybrids.

name: DHS Hash 💎
description: Traditional hand-pressed hash (indica-dominant) with earthy, spicy notes. High THC (40-50%) for deep relaxation. "DHS" may refer to its artisanal, small-batch production.

name: Golden Cheese 💎
description: Hybrid concentrate with creamy, cheesy terpenes and 70-80% THC. Smooth vapor with euphoric and calming effects. A nod to its golden hue and pungent aroma.

name: DeadHot Strawberries 💎
description: Indica-dominant live resin (75%+ THC) with sweet strawberry flavors and heavy sedation. Ideal for nighttime relief. Named for its vibrant red color and potent kick.

name: Ice Cream Cake 💎
description: Dessert-style indica concentrate (80% THC) with vanilla and sugary dough notes. Melts tension away, perfect for stress and insomnia.

name: Tangie Dream 💎
description: Sativa-dominant extract (75% THC) with bold citrus and tropical flavors. Energizing and creative, great for artistic endeavors.

name: Lemon Haze 💎
description: Sativa shatter (78% THC) with sharp lemon-pine terpenes. Uplifting and focus-enhancing, a classic daytime concentrate.

name: Kief 💎
description: Powdered trichomes (50-60% THC) for versatile use (topping bowls or pressing hash). Balanced effects with earthy, floral notes.

name: Jackpot 1ml 🔋
description: Disposable vape pen with high-THC distillate (85%+). Portable and potent, offering consistent hits with minimal odor. Named for its "winning" potency.

name: Fried Eggs 🍳
description: Savory gummies (5-pack, 10mg THC each) with egg-like appearance. Relaxing effects ideal for microdosing or mild euphoria.

name: Cola Gummies 🍬
description: Tangy, soda-flavored edibles (5-pack, 10mg THC). Mellow and uplifting, a nostalgic treat with balanced effects.

name: Hearts ❤️
description: Fruit-flavored gummies (5-pack, 10mg THC) promoting social warmth and mood elevation. Shaped for sharing or romantic occasions.

name: Sour Forbidden Fruit 🍬
description: High-potency gummies (10-pack, 25mg THC each) with long-lasting relaxation. Inspired by the forbidden fruit’s allure and tart flavor.

name: SV10 🍄
description: Psilocybe cubensis strain (1g = ~10mg psilocybin). Earthy, introspective, with medium potency. Ideal for beginners or therapeutic use 15.

name: Fat Nax 🍄
description: High-potency P. cubensis (1g = ~15mg psilocybin). Intense visuals and deep introspection. Named for its thick, robust fruiting bodies 57.

name: Amazonian 🍄
description: Potent P. cubensis variant (1g = ~12mg psilocybin). Linked to Amazonian shamanic rituals, offering vivid hallucinations 58.

name: Inca Stargazer 🍄
description: Gentle P. cubensis (1g = ~8mg psilocybin). Smooth, calming effects inspired by Andean spiritual practices. Ideal for microdosing 7.

name: Kingdong 🍄
description: Potent P. cubensis with distinctive morphology (1g = ~10mg psilocybin). Balanced effects with spiritual clarity. Popular for ceremonial use.

name: Fatnat 🍄
description: Dense-fruiting P. cubensis (1g = ~13mg psilocybin). Heavy-bodied experience with intense visuals. Not recommended for first-timers.

name: Penis Envy 🍄
description: Legendary P. cubensis mutation (1g = ~15mg psilocybin). Extremely potent with profound introspective effects. For experienced users only.

name: ISG 🍄
description: Island strain P. cubensis (1g = ~9mg psilocybin). Clean, euphoric effects with minimal nausea. Ideal for social or creative use.

name: Shaktnami 🍄
description: Sacred P. cubensis variety (1g = ~16mg psilocybin). Named for its spiritual potency. Expect transformative experiences.

name: Rustywhyte 🍄
description: Hybrid P. cubensis (1g = ~10mg psilocybin). Rust-colored caps with gentle yet profound effects. Great for nature immersion.

name: Jackfrost 🍄
description: Albino P. cubensis (1g = ~12mg psilocybin). Frosty appearance with crisp, clear-headed effects. Ideal for creative work.

name: Zstrain 🍄
description: Classic P. cubensis (1g = ~14mg psilocybin). Reliable, well-rounded effects with strong visuals. A community favorite.
